arts.ttl: “The Important thing was to finish the game off” – Thiago Motta reflects on Juventus’ win over Monza
arts.sum: Juventus coach Thiago Motta shared his thoughts following his team’s 2-1 victory over Monza in Serie A. The match featured goals from Weston McKennie, Samuele Birindelli, and Nico Gonzalez, with Juventus securing a hard-fought win. In his post-match interview, Motta reflected on the performance and the challenges faced during the game. The post “The Important thing was to finish the game off” – Thiago Motta reflects on Juventus’ win over Monza appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza 1-2 Juventus: Match Report
arts.sum: Juventus have broken their streak of four consecutive draws in Serie A, securing a vital victory against Monza, who now find themselves at the bottom of the league table. The Bianconeri faced criticism after their latest stalemate against Venezia, making this match crucial to regain momentum. arts.ttl: Juventus Director Giuntoli: “We’ve been following Hancko for some time”
arts.sum: Juventus sporting director Cristiano Giuntoli spoke ahead of the team's match against Monza, addressing the club's upcoming transfer strategies and potential player movements. With the January transfer window approaching, Giuntoli confirmed that the club is keenly interested in bolstering their defensive options, specifically mentioning Feyenoord defender David Hancko. The post Juventus Director Giuntoli: “We’ve been following Hancko for some time” appeared first on FootItalia.com.
